result.eng: His pockets were bursting with gold.
result.ga: Bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an ór
result.orig: Bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an ór
result.html: Bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an órHis pockets were bursting with gold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ṗócaí ag brúċtaiġ leis an órHis pockets were bursting with gold.

result.eng: Plates of gold that would make you blind.
result.ga: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: Plátaí airgid a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatPlates of gold that would make you blind.
result.ponchtml: Plátaí airgid a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatPlates of gold that would make you blind.
